name: Beedop Run 2
description:
This is a sequel to "Beedop Run." It is a 2D platformer game get through it game. Your main goal is to get to the end.

Controls:

-WD(Move L/R)

-Space(Jump)

-S(Power Slam)

-D/Into wall(Grapple)

Blocks:

-Lava(Kills You)

-Ice(Slows You Down Until You Die)

-Grando(Your Main Enemy...Kills You)

Tips:

-You can sprint/ walk in air, so use that to get through some tough spots!

-Ice can sometimes help you, it is not always a bad thing.

Beta Release Date[3/21/21]

Developed By: Gavin Orfield

Produced By: Jarium Studios

-This is the Beta full update will be out soon!

-Any bugs, comments, or suggestions...PUT DOWN BELOW!
